Continue with WordPress.com Enter your store address Log in with your store address Read the %1$sconfiguration instructions%2$s. Scan QR code to login Track sales and high performing products Manage and edit orders on the go Edit and add new products from anywhere New to WooCommerce We know it\'s essential to your business You can manage them quickly and easily We enable you to process them effortlessly What brings you to WooCommerce? Just exploring Trying to set up a store Check my analytics Create or update my products Manage my orders Switch between multiple stores Select store to connect Other sites Connected store Verifying site… Cannot connect to %s Connection Error We were unable to connect to your site. Please contact support to troubleshoot the problem. Update Store to WooCommerce 3.5 This store uses an older version of WooCommerce. Please upgrade your store to WooCommerce 3.5 or greater to use it with this app. Your profile photo No WooCommerce stores Login with a different account We didn\'t find WooCommerce stores connected to this account. It looks like %1$s is connected to a different WordPress.com account. It looks like your account is not connected to %1$s\'s Jetpack Log in with another account Try another store It looks like %1$s is not a WooCommerce site. Install WooCommerce To use this app for %1$s you\'ll need to have the Jetpack plugin setup and connected to this account. \n\nOnce setup, refresh the app To use this app for %1$s you\'ll need to have the Jetpack plugin setup and connected to a WordPress.com account We were not able to detect a WordPress site at the address you entered. Please make sure WordPress is installed and that you are running the latest available version. Refresh the app refresh the app to continue Checking for WooCommerce… Attempting to login with Jetpack… View connected stores To use this app for %1$s you\'ll need to have the Jetpack plugin connected on your store. Learn how to install and connect Jetpack Learn more about connecting Jetpack View setup instructions What is Jetpack? Jetpack is a free WordPress plugin that connects your store with the tools needed to give you the best mobile experience, including push notifications and stats Already have Jetpack? %1$s Jetpack not found. Please try again Install Jetpack Sign in Need help finding the required email? What email do I use to sign in? In your site admin you can find the email you used to connect to WordPress.com from the %1$sJetpack Dashboard%2$s under %3$sConnections > Account connection%4$s Connection error Here are a few other things you can try: Sign in with WordPress.com Read our troubleshooting tips Select an option The email %1$s isn\'t used with a WordPress.com account. This app supports only Administrator and Shop Manager user roles. Please contact your store owner to upgrade your role. Learn more about roles and permissions You don\'t have the correct user role Verifying role… Enter a site address A failure occurred, please contact support New to WooCommerce Connect Jetpack to your account The site %1$s is currently on a WordPress.com plan that does not support plugin installation. Please upgrade your plan to use WooCommerce. Cannot verify your Jetpack connection. Please try again. Verifying Jetpack connection… Fetching connection data failed… 2FA not supported for self-hosted sites. Please use an app-password. Create shipping labels from your device!! We are working on making it easier for you to print shipping labels directly from you device! For now, if you have created shipping labels for this order in your store admin with WooCommerce Shipping, you can print them in your Order Details here. You can now create shipping labels for all physical orders directly from your device with the free WooCommerce Shipping plugin. Tap on "Create shipping label" to try our beta feature! Create shipping label Learn more about creating labels with your mobile device Custom fields View custom fields Print Send Mark order complete Mark Order Complete Order Marked Complete 🎉 Order completed! Order status updated Error fetching notes Error changing order Unable to update address with empty email. Make sure you are running the latest version of WooCommerce. Error fetching order Tracking Tracking Number Tracking number copied to the clipboard Track package Track or delete shipment tracking Shipment tracking Copy tracking number to clipboard Add tracking Deleted shipment tracking Error deleting tracking Tracking deleted If renaming an add-on in your web dashboard, please note that previous orders will no longer show that add-on within the app. View add-ons from your device! We are working on making it easier for you to see product add-ons from your device! For now, you’ll be able to see the add-ons for your orders. You can create and edit these add-ons in your web dashboard. Something went wrong Sorry, we couldn\'t load the Order Add-ons right now OK First name Last name Email Phone Company Address 1 Address 2 City Postal Code State Country Address Shipping Address Billing Address Add customer note Add shipping address Add billing address No address specified Use as Billing Address Use as Shipping Address You can request a refund for a shipping label that has not been used to ship a package. It will take at least 14 days to process. Purchase date Amount eligible for refund Refund label (-%1$s) Refund request was successfully submitted Your refund is being processed. Please wait… Labels older than 30 days cannot be refunded Review order If you’ve enabled this setting, the customer will receive a confirmation email once the order is completed If there was a printing error when you purchased the label, you can print it again. If you already used the label on a package, printing and using it again is a violation of our terms of service. Paper size Choose paper size Print shipping label Print shipping labels See label layout and paper size options Don\'t know how to print with your mobile device? Shipping label purchased! Shipping labels purchased! Save for later Print shipping label Print shipping labels Error previewing shipping label Unable to preview shipping label. Please install a PDF viewer app and try again. Legal (8.5 x 14 in) Letter (8.5 x 11 in) Label (4 x 6 in) 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 Make sure the Print Service Plugin for yor printer is installed. Enable bluetooth or Wifi connection on your printer. When selecting "Print receipt" after accepting payment, replace "Save as PDF" with "All printers", and search for new printer. Pair and connect the printer to your mobile when prompted. Adjust paper size as needed, and select "Print" when ready to print the receipt. If printing is not available, you can always save your receipt as PDF and send it by email to print it from another device. If you are experiencing issues printing from your device, contact customer support for your printer. Print with your device Label format options 1 2 3 4 5 Make sure your printer and your device are connected to the same WiFi networks After selecting \"Print shipping label\", you may have to select and add a printer if you haven\'t printed from this device before. You can select your device\'s default print service or install your printer\'s brand app (this should appear as a recommended option) You might have to configure WiFi printing directly on the printer itself. Make sure the printer firmware is updated and see your printer documentation for instructions. If you are still experiencing issues printing from your device, you can save your label as PDF and send it by email to print it from another device. Label images older than 180 days are deleted by our technology partners for general security and data privacy concerns. WooCommerce Shipping Save time and money by fulfilling with WooCommerce Shipping Cut the post office line by printing shipping labels at home with your mobile device at discounted rates! Refresh Update WooCommerce Payments Outdated version of the WooCommerce Payments extension is installed on your store. Please update it to accept In-Person Payments. In-Person Payments is currently unavailable You\’ll be able to accept In-Person Payments as soon as we finish reviewing your account. Keep an eye out for more options soon! Create products from the app! You can now create and manage product variations! New editing options available New features available! We\'ve added more editing functionalities to products! You can now update images, see previews and share your products. You can now edit grouped, external and variable products, change product type and update categories and tags.  \u2022  Adding options like size and color is currently available only on the web. These will show up as options on the product page of your site. Add your first variation Add Variation Describe your product to your future customers… Tell us more about %s… Edit description Description Describe your product Short description Brief summary about the product Saving your product Deleting product Please wait… Error updating product Product saved Error updating password Enter Product Title Enter text %1$s product Add more details This product has no variations yet Add variations Quantity How many items are in stock SKU already in use by another product Please enter a number Sale price must be less than regular price You must set the sale price if a sale is scheduled Product settings Trash product Do you want to move this product to the Trash? Move to trash Product moved to trash Error trashing product Learn more about uploading images Status Visibility Public Private Enter password Password protected Password is required Catalog visibility Shop and search results Shop only Search results only Hidden Featured product This setting determines which shop pages products will be listed on Slug This is the URL-friendly version of the product title Enable reviews Virtual product Add product link Product link Enter the external URL to the product Button text This text will be shown on the button linking to the external product An optional note to send the customer after purchase Menu order Determines the product\'s positioning in the catalog. The lower the value of the number, the higher the item will be on the product list. You can also use negative numbers.
